results.title: Atenolol and/or nifedipine in effort angina: which is the treatment of choice for exercise coronary protection?
results.journal: Int J Clin Pharmacol Ther Toxicol
results.text_hl: Long-term management of @<m>DISEASE_Dystonia_18</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564288 @@@exertional angina@@@ can be usefully performed using @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Romano M, Di Maro T, Carella G, Cotecchia MR, Caiazzo MR, de Arcangelis E, Chiariello M, Condorelli M. Atenolol and/or nifedipine in effort angina: which is the treatment of choice for exercise coronary protection? Int J Clin Pharmacol Ther Toxicol. 1988 Sep;26(9):468-70. PMID: 3198303

results.title: Anti-ischemic effects of atenolol versus nifedipine in patients with coronary artery disease and ambulatory silent ischemia.
results.text_hl: The anti-@DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ were compared in a randomized double-blind crossover manner in 24 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with stable @<m>DISEASE_Dystonia_18</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564288 @@@exertional angina@@@ and transient silent @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ during ambulatory electrocardiographic (ECG) monitoring.

citations.NLM: Deedwania PC, Carbajal EV, Nelson JR, Hait H. Anti-ischemic effects of atenolol versus nifedipine in patients with coronary artery disease and ambulatory silent ischemia. J Am Coll Cardiol. 1991 Mar 15;17(4):963-9. PMID: 1999634

results.title: Medical treatment of patients with severe exertional and rest angina: double blind comparison of beta blocker, calcium antagonist, and nitrate.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@Pain@@@ was abolished in four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ relief was significantly better on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ than on @CHEMICAL_isosorbide_5_mononitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C030397 @@@isosorbide mononitrate@@@.

citations.NLM: Quyyumi AA, Crake T, Wright CM, Mockus LJ, Fox KM. Medical treatment of patients with severe exertional and rest angina: double blind comparison of beta blocker, calcium antagonist, and nitrate. Br Heart J. 1987 Jun;57(6):505-11. PMID: 3304367
